Member Function Documentation

◆ checkConnectivity()

bool ImageProcessing::checkConnectivity ( cv::Point  origin,
cv::Point  destination 
)

Checks wether the origin and destination can be connected with a line, such that line only goes over free space.

Function that was used to check of two points can be connected and if there are no black pixels in that connection.

Parameters
[in]cv::Pointoirgin - point of origin [i,j] in image coordinates
[in]cv::Pointdestination - point of destination in image coordinates
Returns
bool The points can be connected with a line which only goes over free space
Note
The value for grey pixels was also considered as valid as it can change status as the robot gets closer to the target point
Parameters
origin. Point
destination. Pint
Returns
true if there are no pixels are in the connection line
false if there are pixels are in the connection line

Create a Line Iterator between origib abd destination
